summary.title: Summary
summary.passed: Number of passed rules and techniques
summary.failed: Number of failed rules and techniques
summary.inapplicable: Number of not applicable rules and techniques
summary.warning: Number of warning rules and techniques

report.title: Evaluation Report
report.no_results: There are no such elements to test

INPUT_URL.invalid_url:
The inserted url is invalid!
Make sure the protocol (e.g. http://) is included!
INPUT_URL.invalid_url_below: Make sure the protocol (e.g. http://) is included in the URL

ERROR.modules: You need to execute at least one module!

QW-HTML-T1.name: Providing text alternatives for the area elements of image maps
QW-HTML-T1.description: This technique checks the text alternative of area elements of images maps
QW-HTML-T1.RC1: The element doesn't contain an alt attribute
QW-HTML-T1.RC2: The element's alt attribute value is empty
QW-HTML-T1.RC3: Please verify the alt attribute value describes correctly the correspondent area of the image

QW-HTML-T2.name: Using caption elements to associate data table captions with data tables
QW-HTML-T2.description: This technique checks the caption element is correctly use on tables
QW-HTML-T2.RC1: The caption does not exist in the table element
QW-HTML-T2.RC3: Please verify that the caption element identifies the table correctly.

QW-HTML-T3.name: Providing a description for groups of form controls using fieldset and legend elements
QW-HTML-T3.description: This technique checks the correct use of the description element for form controls
QW-HTML-T3.RC1: The fieldset is not in a form and is not referencing a form
QW-HTML-T3.RC2: The legend does not exist in the fieldset element
QW-HTML-T3.RC4: Please verify that the legend description is valid

QW-HTML-T4.name: Using the summary attribute of the table element to give an overview of data tables
QW-HTML-T4.description: This technique checks the correct use of the summary attribute for table elements
QW-HTML-T4.RC1: The summary does not exist in the table element
QW-HTML-T4.RC3: The caption is a duplicate of the summary
QW-HTML-T4.RC4: Please verify that the summary is a valid description of the table

QW-HTML-T5.name: Using alt attributes on images used as submit buttons
QW-HTML-T5.description: This technique checks all input elements that are buttons use alt text
QW-HTML-T5.RC1: The alt does not exist in the input element
QW-HTML-T5.RC3: Please verify that the alt is a valid description of the input image

QW-ACT-R1.name: HTML Page has a title
QW-ACT-R1.description: This rule checks that the HTML page has a title.
QW-ACT-R1.RC3: <title> element exists and it's not empty
QW-ACT-R1.RC4: <html> element is not the root element of the page

QW-ACT-R2.name: HTML has 'lang' attribute
QW-ACT-R2.description: This rule checks that the html element has a non-empty lang or xml:lang attribute.
QW-ACT-R2.RC2: <html> element is not the root element of the page
QW-ACT-R2.RC5: 'lang' or 'xml:lang' attribute is empty or undefined

QW-ACT-R3.name: HTML lang and xml:lang match
QW-ACT-R3.description: The rule checks that for the html element, there is no mismatch between the primary language in non-empty lang and xml:lang attributes, if both are used.
QW-ACT-R3.RC2: <html> element is not the root element of the page

QW-ACT-R4.name: Meta-refresh no delay
QW-ACT-R4.description: This rule checks that the meta element is not used for delayed redirecting or refreshing.
QW-ACT-R4.RC1: Already exists one valid or invalid <meta> element above
QW-ACT-R4.RC8: It refreshes after more than 20 hours
QW-ACT-R4.RC9: It doesn't refresh immediately nor after more than 20 hours
QW-ACT-R4.RC13: It redirects after more than 20 hours
QW-ACT-R4.RC14: It doesn't redirect immediately nor after more than 20 hours

QW-ACT-R5.name: Validity of HTML 'lang' attribute
QW-ACT-R5.description: This rule checks the lang or xml:lang attribute has a valid language subtag.
QW-ACT-R5.RC2: <html> element is not the root element of the page
QW-ACT-R5.RC4: 'lang' and 'xml:lang' attributes have a valid value

ABOUT_PAGE.about_1: QualWeb is an automated web accessibility evaluation service which incorporates contributions from different research projects and efforts.
ABOUT_PAGE.about_2: QualWeb is able to automatically check a webpage against a set of
ABOUT_PAGE.about_3: QualWeb will also make available, from time to time, experimental modules that come out of specific research projects, and which might improve different aspects of web accessibility evaluation (for example, a module to assess the quality of text alternatives). You will always have the option to use QualWeb without these modules.
ABOUT_PAGE.about_4: QualWeb is open-source and available at
ABOUT_PAGE.about_5: You can use QualWeb online at this website, as a
ABOUT_PAGE.about_6: , you can integrate in your javascript projects or use it as a
ABOUT_PAGE.about_projects: The following projects have contributed to QualWeb's development:
ABOUT_PAGE.access_1: Accessibility is an important topic for us. For that reason we try to make QualWeb as accessible as possible. Conformance wise we aim to meet the
ABOUT_PAGE.access_2: level AA standard. In this section we describe the accessibility features of this web site. If you have any problem while using QualWeb, on the website, or in any of the other formats,
ABOUT_PAGE.access_3: and we will try to solve the issue as fast as we can.
ABOUT_PAGE.features_2: Colors used for text have a contrast with the background of at least 4.5 to 1.
ABOUT_PAGE.features_3: All icons and images have a textual alternative.
ABOUT_PAGE.features_4: The design is responsive, adapting to mobile and desktop platforms.
ABOUT_PAGE.features_5: The website has been tested with different combinations of browsers and assistive technology.
ABOUT_PAGE.contact_1: Reach out to us with your suggestions using the email
